Anyone in the comments who will say we should die for looking at this. Please do some quick research on Japan's fixation on "innocence". They believe it to be the holiest thing ever, the same reason why in their shounen anime, the extremely buff MC has a very high voice. It is to make them essentially man-children, like every male character in Dragon Ball that has an extremely buff physique: Goku, Vegeta, Roshi, Tien Shinhan, Krillin, etc. Being a man-child essentially means your innocent, and that makes you pure, and Japan gets a HUGE boner/drenched pussy from that.
